channel.title: Delta making food edible

item.title: Delta making food edible
item.dc:creator: @anti-crime anti-crime
item.description:
@anti-crime wrote:

Hey guys i’m actually coding a delta source, yes i’m one of the only few fans of delta, and i’m trying to add new food into the system and make it edible. When i edit the potion.java file and put in a certain code, in game it still doesn’t make the food edible, can someone teach me how to do this?

case 385: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.setAnimation(0x33D); //c.playSound(317, 000, 020); c.sM("You eat the shark."); if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){ c.sM("It heals some health."); } c.deleteItem(385, slot, 1); c.currentHealth += 20; if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]) c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]; c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016); break;

Read full topic
